sqlMap.select: SELECT A.USER_SN, A.USER_ID, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_PW, A.CELL, A.EMAIL, A.UPDT_DT, A.UPDUSR_SN, B.PRIVGRP_SN, C.PRIVGRP_NAME, C.PRIVGRP_DESC, C.PRIORT, C.USE_YN FROM SM_USER A, SM_USERPRIV B, SM_PRIVGRP C WHERE A.USER_SN = B.USER_SN AND B.PRIVGRP_SN = C.PRIVGRP_SN AND A.USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND A.USER_PW = #USER_PW#
